import React from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useI18n } from '../context/I18nContext'; import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext'; const Navbar = () => { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { isAuthenticated, logout } = useAuth(); const { t } = useI18n(); const { isDark } = useTheme(); const isActive = (path) => location.pathname === path ? { color: '#667eea' } : {}; const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; return (
AiThor
Home {!isAuthenticated ? ( <> Login Register Get Started ) : ( <> Dashboard )}
); }; export default Navbar;
